headline: Navatar and Inven Partner to Deliver AI-Powered Deal Origination for Private Equity and M&A Advisory On Salesforce
summary: A Media Snippet accompanying this announcement is available by clicking on this link. LONDON and NEW YORK, Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Navatar, the leading CRM platform for private markets, today announced a strategic partnership with Inven, the AI-powered platform for discovering and analyzing private companies. The partnership integrates Inven’s advanced deal-sourcing intelligence directly into Navatar’s CRM, giving investment professionals a unified, data-rich, and automated environment

The partnership integrates Inven’s advanced deal-sourcing intelligence directly into Navatar’s CRM, giving investment professionals a unified, data-rich, and automated environment

headline: Stocks to Watch Thursday: Salesforce, Kroger, Snowflake

headline: CRM Q3 Deep Dive: AI-Powered Adoption Drives Salesforce Growth and Guidance
summary: CRM software giant Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 8.6% year on year to $10.26 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $11.18 billion, coming in 2.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.25 per share was 13.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: CRM Q3 Deep Dive: AI-Powered Adoption Drives Salesforce Growth and Guidance
content.summary: CRM software giant Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 8.6% year on year to $10.26 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $11.18 billion, coming in 2.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.25 per share was 13.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Alphabet’s AI Chips Are a Potential $900 Billion ‘Secret Sauce’
summary: The success of Alphabet’s tensor processing unit, or TPU, chips is a primary reason for the stock’s 31% fourth-quarter rally, which is the tenth best performance in the S&P 500 Index.  The TPUs were always seen as a major strength internally, accelerating growth for the company’s cloud-computing business.

content.title: Alphabet’s AI Chips Are a Potential $900 Billion ‘Secret Sauce’
content.summary: The success of Alphabet’s tensor processing unit, or TPU, chips is a primary reason for the stock’s 31% fourth-quarter rally, which is the tenth best performance in the S&P 500 Index.  The TPUs were always seen as a major strength internally, accelerating growth for the company’s cloud-computing business.

headline: Salesforce Stock Rises on Earnings. Profits Were the Big Story.
summary: Salesforce  stock rose ahead of the open Thursday after the company reported mixed third-quarter earnings results late Wednesday.  Adjusted earnings pershare were $3.25, well ahead of Wall Street’s consensus estimate of $2.86, up from $2.41 last year.  Profitability soared in the third quarter as seen in the earnings beat and in the company’s adjusted operating profit margin of 35.5%, ahead of expectations of 34.1%, and up from 33.1% last year.

content.title: Salesforce Stock Rises on Earnings. Profits Were the Big Story.
content.summary: Salesforce  stock rose ahead of the open Thursday after the company reported mixed third-quarter earnings results late Wednesday.  Adjusted earnings pershare were $3.25, well ahead of Wall Street’s consensus estimate of $2.86, up from $2.41 last year.  Profitability soared in the third quarter as seen in the earnings beat and in the company’s adjusted operating profit margin of 35.5%, ahead of expectations of 34.1%, and up from 33.1% last year.

headline: Meta faces EU probe, Palantir's software deal & Salesforce results
summary: Shares of Meta (META) edged higher ahead of the open, even as the company faces a new antitrust probe in the EU. Regulators are focused on Meta's WhatsApp messaging app and the use of AI on the platform. Separately, Palantir (PLTR) is teaming up with utility company CenterPoint (CNP) and Nvidia (NVDA) to create new software to speed up the building of AI data centers. Salesforce (CRM) shares are rising after third quarter earnings beat expectations. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

content.title: Meta faces EU probe, Palantir's software deal & Salesforce results
content.description:
Shares of Meta (META) edged higher ahead of the open, even as the company faces a new antitrust probe in the EU. Regulators are focused on Meta's WhatsApp messaging app and the use of AI on the platform. Separately, Palantir (PLTR) is teaming up with utility company CenterPoint (CNP) and Nvidia (NVDA) to create new software to speed up the building of AI data centers. Salesforce (CRM) shares are rising after third quarter earnings beat expectations.

For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.
content.summary: Shares of Meta (META) edged higher ahead of the open, even as the company faces a new antitrust probe in the EU. Salesforce (CRM) shares are rising after third quarter earnings beat expectations. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

headline: Globant (GLOB) Is Up 10.2% After Securing Expanded FIFA Deal and Salesforce AI Recognition
summary: In November 2025, FIFA announced an expanded agreement with Globant to enhance its digital platforms and build a new mobile app supporting multiple major tournaments, while granting Globant Tournament Supporter status for the FIFA World Cup 2026 and FIFA Women's World Cup 2027. Together with fresh recognition from Salesforce for top-tier expertise across MuleSoft Anypoint, Data Cloud, and Agentforce, these wins underline Globant's growing role in complex, global-scale AI and integration...

headline: Salesforce Stock Rises After Earnings. Why It’s Not Yet the Turning Point.
summary: Salesforce  stock rose ahead of the open of trading Thursday after the company reported mixed third-quarter earnings.  Salesforce posted late Wednesday adjusted earnings per share were $3.25, well ahead of Wall Street’s consensus estimate of $2.86, up from $2.41 last year.  Profitability soared in the third quarter as seen in the earnings beat and in the company’s adjusted operating profit margin of 35.5%, ahead of expectations of 34.1%, and up from 33.1% last year.

content.title: Salesforce Stock Rises After Earnings. Why It’s Not Yet the Turning Point.
content.summary: Salesforce  stock rose ahead of the open of trading Thursday after the company reported mixed third-quarter earnings.  Salesforce posted late Wednesday adjusted earnings per share were $3.25, well ahead of Wall Street’s consensus estimate of $2.86, up from $2.41 last year.  Profitability soared in the third quarter as seen in the earnings beat and in the company’s adjusted operating profit margin of 35.5%, ahead of expectations of 34.1%, and up from 33.1% last year.

headline: Accounting Seed Receives Salesforce 2025 Partner Innovation Award
summary: Accounting Seed announced that it has been named a recipient of the Salesforce Partner Innovation Award in the Education Category for their support of JumpRope, an educational software company empowering teachers, students, and families with actionable, standards-based insights—making learning real and visible for all ages.

content.title: Accounting Seed Receives Salesforce 2025 Partner Innovation Award
content.summary: Accounting Seed announced that it has been named a recipient of the Salesforce Partner Innovation Award in the Education Category for their support of JumpRope, an educational software company empowering teachers, students, and families with actionable, standards-based insights—making learning real and visible for all ages.

headline: Alteryx Appoints Bill Tabbit-Humphrey as Chief Customer Officer
summary: Alteryx, Inc., a leading AI and data analytics company, today announced the appointment of Bill Tabbit-Humphrey to Chief Customer Officer. Tabbit-Humphrey, who previously served as Senior Vice President of Customer Experience at Alteryx, brings over 25 years of experience in both pre-sales and post-sales customer engagement, with a track record of helping organizations scale and transform operations globally.

headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Meta Platforms, Snowflake, UiPath, Dollar General, Hormel Foods, and More
summary: Separately, the company was hit by an antitrust investigation from the European Union on Thursday, with a Meta representative telling Barron’s that regulators’ claims were “baseless.”  The software company beat analysts’ third-quarter earnings estimates, though revenue narrowly missed expectations.  Salesforce highlighted its artificial-intelligence efforts, noting that annual recurring revenue from agentic  products—programs that have the ability to take simple directions and complete multistep tasks—came in at $540 million, up $100 million from a quarter earlier.

headline: C3.ai's new CEO discusses earnings and AI government contracts
summary: C3.ai (AI) CEO Stephen Ehikian — who took the reins from founder and chairman Thomas Siebel in September — speaks with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi about the company's latest earnings results, enterprise AI demand, and the growth in US government contracts. Ehikian is also the former VP of Product at Salesforce (CRM). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.description:
C3.ai (AI) CEO Stephen Ehikian — who took the reins from founder and chairman Thomas Siebel in September — speaks with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi about the company's latest earnings results, enterprise AI demand, and the growth in US government contracts.

Ehikian is also the former VP of Product at Salesforce (CRM).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

Salesforce highlighted its artificial-intelligence efforts, noting that annual recurring revenue from agentic  products—programs that have the ability to take simple directions and complete multistep tasks—came in at $540 million, up $100 million from a quarter earlier.

headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Meta Platforms, Salesforce, Snowflake, UiPath, Micron, Dollar General, Kroger, and More
summary: Stocks wavered Thursday ahead of the release Friday of the personal consumption expenditures price index, the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation gauge, and the central bank’s decision on interest rates next week.  Separately, the company was hit by an antitrust investigation from the European Union on Thursday, with a Meta representative telling Barron’s that regulators’ claims were “baseless.”  The software company beat analysts’ third-quarter earnings estimates, though revenue narrowly missed expectations.

headline: Salesforce Lifts Some of Its AI Cloud
summary: Salesforce has had an awfully hard time selling itself as an AI player.  The cloud software giant’s share price picked up 4% by Thursday afternoon following its fiscal third-quarter report.  If the gains hold, it will be the first time in a year that Salesforce shares have risen on the day after earnings, according to FactSet data.

headline: Salesforce stock gains on earnings, Snowflake stock plunges
summary: Salesforce (CRM) stock is rising after the company lifted its sales outlook and reported agentic artificial intelligence (AI) adoption growth. Meanwhile, Snowflake (SNOW) stock is tumbling after the company's weak outlook overshadowed its earnings beat. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporters Ines Ferré and Brooke DiPalma dive deeper into Salesforce's and Snowflake's post-earnings stock moves with Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Wall Street inches closer to its all-time high
summary: Dollar General helped lead the market and rallied 14% after reporting a stronger profit for the latest quarter than analysts expected.  It also gave a forecasted range for profit in the upcoming year whose midpoint was above analysts’ forecasts.  It delivered a better profit for the latest quarter than analysts expected, though its revenue fell just short.

headline: Heard on the Street Recap: Yields Rising
summary: The 10-year government-bond yield in Japan rose to 1.941%, the highest since 2007.  On Thursday, Bank of Japan Gov. Kazuo Ueda suggested the bank isn't sure how many more interest-rate hikes might be required.  In the U.S., the 10-year Treasury yield rose 0.05 percentage point to 4.107%.

content.title: Heard on the Street Recap: Yields Rising
content.summary: The 10-year government-bond yield in Japan rose to 1.941%, the highest since 2007.  On Thursday, Bank of Japan Gov. Kazuo Ueda suggested the bank isn't sure how many more interest-rate hikes might be required.  In the U.S., the 10-year Treasury yield rose 0.05 percentage point to 4.107%.

headline: Salesforce touts AI momentum, but software space faces headwinds
summary: Salesforce (CRM) stock gains after reporting mixed third quarter earnings results, where the company lifted its outlook and highlighted agentic AI adoption. CFRA Research senior vice president and equity analyst Angelo Zino joins Market Catalysts to talk about the dynamics impacting Salesforce, including the company's AI efforts, as the broader software as a service (SaaS) space faces pressures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
